1370: Folpertus moved to Helle voet.B.2 after marriage.
Got married to Uergina at age 26 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Uergina, Wouter, at age 27.
1372: Had a son with Uergina, Rembrecht, at age 28.
1374: Had a daughter with Uergina, Myrthel, at age 30.
1377: Had a daughter with Uergina, Godeweris, at age 33.
Lost son Rembrecht when Rembrecht was 6 years old.
1378: Had a son with Uergina, Woubbrecht, at age 34.
1381: Had a daughter with Uergina, Marisseis, at age 37.
1384: Had a daughter with Uergina, Ermerut, at age 40.
1386: Lost daughter Godeweris when Godeweris was 10 years old.
1388: Had a daughter with Uergina, Nimme, at age 44.
1390: Lost daughter Nimme when Nimme was 3 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
